creator: Nuzit
descriptionHtml:
Nuzit is a news app where you can read the latest news brief and here you will have the option of social networking, which means besides news reading you can use its wall feed feature to share and comment on the news.

Nuzit, the news app offers the winning combo of comprehensive news reading and social networking. With the app downloaded, you can read trending news outlines, both national and international category, share them, and comment on them. Other users can read the news from your wall and post their comments in the comment trail. The app will help you to stay updated about the news events and also about the social repercussions of the news.

You will get to read all the trending news covering the following eight categories. These categories include:
• Technology
• Science
• Business
• Sports
• Health
• Entertainment
• Stock Market

Now staying updated about the latest news and current affairs will be easier than ever before. Stop your news daily hunt with the fast news and breaking newsfeed of Nuzit.

App’s features:
• Easy and simple user interface and friendly navigation.
• You will get the summaries of the news, reading the headline news will hardly take your time.
• You can share the e-news, flip news, and popular stories on your social media accounts.
• You can set your preference from the local news and international news from the categories so the notification settings.
• Share your opinion: know the pulse of the other users and your friends only on Nuzit.
• News and stories are available from national and international sources.


Download the app Nuzit today, and enjoy the latest news feed at your fingertips whenever you want. Enjoy reading news in brief and save your time.
Download now!!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes and minor UI improvements
